TITLE: Data Scientist
JOB_DESCRIPTION:
Must be located in NYC. Please apply by emailing recruiting@shoponpickle.com




Pickle is a rental marketplace that aims to monetize the billions of underutilized assets sitting in consumers closets and brands inventory. Users can easily tap into shared closets within their community through flexible and/or on-demand delivery options. Our goal is to provide affordable and convenient access to quality items exactly when our users need them. We are starting with P2P clothing/accessories and expanding to other categories.




We are seeking a talented and motivated Growth Engineer to join our team and play a crucial role in driving user acquisition, retention, and overall marketplace growth for our platform. The Growth Engineer will combine technical expertise with strategic thinking to optimize user journeys, enhance features, and implement data-driven growth initiatives. This candidate will work directly with the co-founders to hit growth goals.




Requirements




Experience in growth engineering or a similar role, preferably within e-commerce, marketplace, or tech startup environments
Strong proficiency in programming languages such as Python, JavaScript, or similar, and experience with relevant frameworks and libraries
Solid understanding of data analytics, A/B testing, and user behavior tracking
Experience with web and app optimization techniques for user onboarding improvements
Experience working with growth tools and platforms, such as Mixpanel, Google Analytics, or similar
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. Advanced degree or relevant certifications are a plus




Responsibilities
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product and marketing to develop and execute growth strategies that align with business goals
Provide technical support and insights to the marketing team for the execution of data-driven campaigns and initiatives
Identify and prioritize growth opportunities through data analysis, A/B testing, and user behavior insights
Develop and implement technical solutions to improve user acquisition, activation, and customer conversion rates across the platform
Continuously monitor and evaluate the effectiveness of growth initiatives and experiments, iterating on strategies based on data-driven insights
Build and maintain scalable systems for tracking and analyzing key performance metrics related to growth efforts
Collaborate with the engineering team to implement website and app enhancements to improve the overall user experience
Optimize and enhance user onboarding processes to ensure a seamless experience and increase download to sign-up conversion rates
Develop and maintain referral programs, user incentives, and loyalty programs to encourage user-generated growth




Benefits




Grow with the company
Work directly with the founders and executive team
Professional coaching
Training & Development
